dcterms:description: The Propaganda Techniques Corpus (PTC) dataset consists of a training set of 350 news articles, containing over 16,965 total sentences, with manually spotted and labelled propagandistic fragments by experts. It includes a development set of 61 articles and a test set of 86 articles.
dcterms:title: Propaganda Techniques Corpus (PTC)
